ProgramBlock.Name: DHT-11 Sensor
ProgramBlock.Description: Temperature and Humidity sensing using DHT-11 with data pin on GPIO#23. Edit program code line #1 to change the data pin GPIO. See example video at http://homegenie.it/docs/diy/eden.php .

ProgramBlock.Name: DHT-22 Sensor
ProgramBlock.Description: Temperature and Humidity sensing using DHT-22 with data pin on GPIO#4. Edit program code line #1 to change the data pin GPIO.

ProgramBlock.Name: GPIO Input Sensor
ProgramBlock.Description: Shows status of a GPIO input pin

ProgramBlock.Name: GPIO Output Switch
Grove - Chainable RGB Led
ProgramBlock.Description: Chainable RGB color leds modules wired to GPIO#4 and GPIO#21/27 (power with 3v3). http://www.seeedstudio.com/wiki/Grove_-_Chainable_RGB_LED
